attributes.action: Make School Meals Free For All Students In The UK.
attributes.additional_details: The government should provide free school meals to ensure every child, regardless of economic background, has access to proper nutrition. This promotes health, reduces educational inequalities, and enhances academic performance. It fosters a fair and inclusive education system, contributing to a healthier, more equitable society in the long run.
attributes.background:
Combatting Hunger: Ensure all students have access to nutritious meals, promoting health and concentration.

Equality: Address socio-economic disparities for a level playing field in education.

Academic Performance: Improve attendance and learning outcomes by supporting students' basic needs.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/651584

Arrangements for free school meals in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland are a matter for the devolved administrations, not the UK Government or Parliament.
